section_5.dec_2: Trading courses in both knowledge and mind control

section_6.title: Frequently asked questions about online trading courses

results.title: Are online trading courses suitable for those who have no basic knowledge ?
results.dec: Many online trading courses are designed to get you started with no prior knowledge, teaching you everything from the basics of trading, market analysis, to using trading tools. There are also advanced courses for those with more experience.

results.title: After completing the course, will I be able to trade on my own immediately ?
results.dec: By the end of the online trading course, learners will have the basic knowledge needed to start trading. However, practice is key. Trying out demo accounts or starting with small amounts will help you build your trading skills and experience.

results.title: Are there any certifications for online trading courses ?
results.dec: Some online trading courses will offer a certificate upon completion of the course, which can serve as proof of your trading knowledge and ability. This certificate can be helpful in building credibility when applying for jobs or starting to trade seriously.

section_1.title: Angel Trade teaches online trading.
section_1.dec: Nangfa Phatrade Company has been open for 3 years and operates in the field of teaching gold trading. There are many teaching courses, such as face-to-face teaching, online teaching, seminars, and a university-style teaching website. The purpose of this is to make it convenient for everyone who comes to learn, whether they already have a basic understanding of trading or have no basic understanding of trading at all.

results.title: Trading Basics for Beginners
results.dec: Introduction to online trading and various types of investments such as Forex, Stocks, and Cryptocurrencies to understand the basics before starting to trade.

results.dec_1: Teaches technical analysis to read price charts, including using various tools and indicators, and fundamental analysis to assess the value of assets.
results.dec_2: Learn how to manage trading risks to prevent losses and plan your investments systematically to increase your chances of making profits.

results.title: Use online trading platforms
results.dec: Recommend how to use trading platforms such as MetaTrader or TradingView and various additional tools to help in making investment decisions.

section_1.title: How to buy a course in 5 minutes
section_1.dec: Buying online trading courses with QR Code is a convenient and fast way, especially in this era of rapid technological advancement. Here are some easy steps to buy courses with QR Code PromptPay.
section_1.item_2: Send the slip. The system will check it automatically
section_1.item_3: Watch the online course for a full 1 year.

results.title: Login / Register or enter via OTP
results.dec: Sign up and log in to the system. You can log in via OTP, which will be sent to your email, making login easier and more secure.

results.title: Select the desired course. Click to buy the course
results.dec: Once logged in, you can go to the All Courses page and select the desired course. There are details to view before purchasing the course.

results.title: Scan QR CODE to pay from our system
results.dec: Once you have selected a course, click on the course you want to order. You will see the order menu. When you click on it, you will see a QR Code for payment.

results.title: Attach the transfer slip and receive the course immediately
results.dec: After completing the payment, please attach the slip to the system. It is located below the QR Code. We have a slip verification system that is 100% secure and accurate.
